title: Salmi of pheasant (or partridge, or guinea fowl) with roast chestnuts
ingredients: 2 pheasants, or 3 partridges, or 3 guinea fowl, with giblets (ie neck, gizzard, heart and liver, washed and trimmed of any discoloured parts if necessary) if possible
a little sunflower or olive oil
salt and freshly ground black pepper
